channel.title: Best Way to Back Up Data?
channel.description:
I'm shopping around for backing up my files on my computer. What's the best option? I've heard some good things about Carbonite. But I've also heard that once you have a certain amount of files, things start to lag. Of course, there are other cloud services I could try. But having all of my files on someone's server kind of rubs me the wrong way. And what about RAID? It sounds too complicated with all the different options and everything. Or are there other alternatives?
Thanks :wink:
